knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
# using the data from the jsoneditor simple example
#  in R list form
# https://github.com/timelyportfolio/listviewer#jsoneditor
library(listviewer)

jsonedit(
  list(
    array = c(1,2,3)
    ,boolean = TRUE
    ,null = NULL
    ,number = 123
    ,object = list( a="b", c="d" )
    ,string = "Hello World"
  )
)

```
